newsitem.title: USA: AFTER THE BELL - Intel Corp keeps falling.
newsitem.headline: AFTER THE BELL - Intel Corp keeps falling.

text.p: Intel Corp, which fell 3-3/8 during regular trading hours, continued its decline after the bell on Wednesday, traders said.
"Intel's trading a little lower after the close, at 132-7/8," one trader said. Intel had closed at 133-3/8.
Also moving down was Avant! Corp, which fell a point to 25-3/4 after the close. Avant! had gained two points during regular trading hours.
Speedfam International Inc rose more than a point, to 34-1/4 from 333, after releasing third-quarter results. During regular trading hours the stock had plunged 4-1/4 points.
The New York Stock Exchange said session one volume was 26,700, while it was 31,700 on Tuesday. Session two volume was 3,617,892, compared to 192,400 on Tuesday.
